value.0:
A pair of worn leather boots, with the brown polish faded from use. By all accounts, they should be about ready to fall apart, but as the handful of wearers have found out, they simply do not damage in any way. No manner what treacherous roads they walk, through bogs, woods or deserts, they remain in the same state as they were before. In fact, the more canny of wearers have noticed that in terms of desperation, these boots direct toward the safer of paths, allowing their wearer to avoid deadly pitfalls and traps. 

While nothing has been confirmed, the more vocal of dwarven kind have proclaimed them to be a gift from the deity Marthammor Duin, though others are less enthusiastic at the fervor these dwarves have shown trying to claim the boots for themselves.
